TEXT.TITLE: HOUSE SUBCOMMITTEE POSTPONES FSLIC ACTION
TEXT.BODY: The financial institutions subcommittee of the House Banking Committee postponed indefinitely a session to draft legislation on the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corp, FSLIC. The mark-up session was postponed after Democrats on the subcommittee failed in a caucus to agree on several issues, including the size of a financial rescue package for FSLIC, a committee staff member said. On Tuesday, the Senate Banking Committee passed a bill to recapitalize FSLIC at 7.5 billion dlrs over two years. Reuter
